title: Searching Visualizer
description: Developed an interactive web tool illustrating linear and binary search algorithms, enabling users to generate arrays and customize animation speed and size

title: Musico App
description: Developed an interactive webApp in which the user can play any song from a given list.  Users can play, pause, change to the next and previous songs.

title: NEWSbite-React-App
description: Developed a dynamic platform facilitating users to access and browse current news updates effortlessly.
